meta.title: Heads-Up Zone - Crazy Parking Jam
meta.description: Important disclaimers and information about Crazy Parking Jam game.

sections.title: Game Disclaimer
paragraphs: Crazy Parking Jam is a fictional game created for entertainment purposes only. Any resemblance to real parking situations is purely coincidental and should not be used as a guide for actual parking.
The game is designed to be challenging and fun, but it does not accurately represent real-world physics or driving conditions.

sections.title: Age Appropriateness
paragraphs: Crazy Parking Jam is suitable for players of all ages. There is no violence, inappropriate language, or mature content in the game.

sections.title: In-App Purchases
paragraphs: While Crazy Parking Jam is free to download and play, it does offer optional in-app purchases. These purchases are not required to complete the game but can enhance the gaming experience by providing:

sections.title: Data Collection
paragraphs: Crazy Parking Jam collects minimal user data to improve the gaming experience. We may collect:

sections.title: Internet Connection
paragraphs: An internet connection is required for certain features of the game, including downloading updates, participating in tournaments, and syncing game progress across devices.
However, the core gameplay can be enjoyed offline once the game is installed.
